attributes.action: Ban firework sales to the public
attributes.additional_details:
To ban ALL firework sales to general public !!!
Causes too much suffering to animals and people . The bangs get louder each year causing stress and even death to animals. . 
Fireworks are used against emergency services . They are dangerous and sales to public must be stopped ! 
Too many younger people are getting their hands on them and causing injury to others or themselves. People are getting disfigured by something that has no purpose at all .
attributes.background: Stop all firework sales to general public !

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319891
